content: You can disable the ability for users to manage and customize file information columns in list view.

comment.text: You can disable the ability for users to manage and customize file information columns in list view. This setting is typically found on a portal settings page or similar configuration option.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'manage and customize' is not fully captured by 'إدارة وتخصيص'. 'إدارة' implies management, but 'تخصيص' focuses solely on customization. A more accurate translation for 'manage' could include options for sorting, filtering, or reordering, which are all forms of management in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يمكنك تعطيل قدرة المستخدمين على إدارة (مثل الترتيب والتصفية) وتخصيص أعمدة معلومات الملف في طريقة عرض القائمة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'fərdiləşdirmək' is a less common and potentially awkward phrasing for 'customize'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadəçilərin siyahı görünüşündə fayl məlumatı sütunlarını idarə etmək və özelleştirmək imkanını söndürə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'anpassen' (customize) is correctly spelled but could be slightly more precise. While 'anpassen' means 'to adapt' or 'to customize', in a technical context, 'konfigurieren' (to configure) might be a better fit to convey the ability to set up and manage columns.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sie können die Möglichkeit für Benutzer deaktivieren, Dateiinformationsspalten in der Listenansicht zu verwalten und zu konfigurieren.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "να προσαρμόζουν" (to customize) could be more accurately translated as "να τροποποιούν" (to modify) in this context. While 'customize' can be translated as 'προσαρμόζουν,' 'τροποποιούν' is more commonly used for describing adjustments to existing system features.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μπορείτε να απενεργοποιήσετε τη δυνατότητα των χρηστών να διαχειρίζονται και να τροποποιούν τις στήλες πληροφοριών αρχείων στην προβολή λίστας.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "file information columns" is a bit clunky in Spanish. A more natural phrasing would be "columnas de información de los archivos" or simply "columnas de información".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puede desactivar la capacidad de los usuarios para administrar y personalizar las columnas de información de los archivos en la vista de lista.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'luottelonäkymässä' is not the most accurate translation of 'list view'. 'Luettelonäkymässä' would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Voit ottaa pois käytöstä käyttäjien mahdollisuuden hallita ja mukauttaa tiedoston tietosarakkeita luettelonäkymässä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ցանկի' (tsanki) is a slightly awkward wording. While technically correct, it implies 'list' as a specific entity, which isn't the intended meaning. It's better to use a more general term related to views or interfaces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ցանկի' with 'լուրջ' (lurj) or a similar term that refers to the view itself.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly complex for Armenian.  The repeated use of 'կառավարելու և հարմարեցնելու հնարավորությունը' creates a cumbersome flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Restructure the sentence to make it more readable. For example: 'Դուք կարող եք անջատել օգտատերերին թույլտվություն տալու ֆայլերի տեղեկատվության սյունակները կառավարելու և հարմարեցնելու ֆունկցիան:' (You can disable the function that allows users to manage and customize file information columns.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation, while generally understandable, doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'disable the ability.' It sounds a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing might emphasize preventing users from doing something.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: リストビューのファイル情報列をユーザーが管理およびカスタマイズするのを禁止することができます。(Risuto byū no fairu jōhō retsu o yūzā ga kanri oyobi kasutaimuzu suru no o kinshi suru koto ga dekimasu.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'および' (oyobi) feels slightly formal for this context. While not incorrect, a more conversational alternative might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: リストビューのファイル情報列をユーザーが管理したり、カスタマイズしたりする機能を無効にすることができます。(Risuto byū no fairu jōhō retsu o yūzā ga kanri shitari, kasutaimuzu shitari suru kō na o mēi ni suru koto ga dekimasu.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ຄວາມສາມາດສໍາລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ໃນການຄຸ້ມຄອງ' is a bit awkward and doesn't directly convey the meaning of 'ability for users to manage'. A more natural phrasing would be 'ສິດໃນການຄຸ້ມຄອງ' or 'ການຄຸ້ມຄອງຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານ​ສາ​ມາດ​ປິດ​ການ​ທໍາ​ງານ​ສິດ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ຜູ້​ໃຊ້​ໃນ​ການ​ຄຸ້ມ​ຄອງ​ແລະ​ປັບ​ຄໍ​ລໍາ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ​ໄຟລ​໌​ໃນ​ການ​ເບິ່ງ​ລາຍ​ການ​.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ປິດ' (pid) is generally accurate, but in this context 'ບິດ' (bit) could arguably be considered a better fit, implying the disabling of a feature or setting. However, 'ປິດ' is still acceptable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, 'ປິດ' is acceptable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Varat atspējot lietotāju iespēju pārvaldīt un pielāgot failu informācijas kolonnas saraksta skatā." is a bit verbose and could be more concise. While technically correct, it's not as natural-sounding as it could be.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Varat atspējot lietotāju iespēju pārvaldīt un pielāgot failu kolonnas saraksta skatā.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'dostosowywania ich przez użytkowników' is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it's more natural to rephrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Możesz wyłączyć możliwość zarządzania kolumnami z informacjami o plikach i umożliwienia użytkownikom ich dostosowywania w widoku listy.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Você pode desativar a capacidade dos usuários de gerenciar e personalizar colunas de informações de arquivo na exibição de lista' is a bit wordy and could be more concise. 'Capacidade dos usuários' is a lengthy phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Você pode desativar a capacidade dos usuários gerenciar e personalizar colunas de informações de arquivo na exibição de lista.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly verbose and doesn't capture the conciseness of the English original. "care conțin informații despre fișiere" is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puteți dezactiva posibilitatea utilizatorilor de a gestiona și de a personaliza coloanele în vizualizare listă.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "отключить для пользователей" is slightly awkward. It translates literally to "disable for users," which isn't the most natural way to express the intended meaning. A more natural phrasing would be something like "запретить пользователям" or "лишить пользователей возможности".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вы можете запретить пользователям управлять и настраивать столбцы с информацией о файле в виде списка.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "අබල කිරීමට" (abal karamita) is an awkward and somewhat uncommon way to express 'disable'. A more natural and common phrasing would be 'අවනතට දැමීමට' (avanata damima) or simply 'නවත්වා දැමීමට' (navathva damima).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "අබල කිරීමට" with "අවනතට දැමීමට" or "නවත්වා දැමීමට".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ගොනු තොරතුරු තීරු කළමනාකරණ සහ අභිරුචිකරණ පහසුකම" is a bit complex and could be simplified for better readability. The word order might be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the phrase to something like "ගොනු තොරතුරු කළමනාකරණය සහ අභිරුචිකරණ පහසුකම" or "ගොනු තොරතුරු තීරු කිරීමේ සහ අභිරුචිකරණ පහසුකම".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation is a bit long and could benefit from slightly improved phrasing for readability. While grammatically correct, it's somewhat clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Používateľom môžete zakázať správu a prispôsobovanie stĺpcov s informáciami o súboroch v zobrazení zoznamu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'онемогуц́ити' is a less common and potentially awkward phrasing. While technically correct, it could be improved for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете искључити могућност...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'Можете искључити могућност корисницима да управљају и прилагођавају...' is slightly cumbersome. It can be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете искључити могућност корисницима да управљају и прилагођавају своје колоне...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'прилагођавају' is translated as 'customize', which is a reasonable translation, but 'своје' (their own) would provide better clarity. The original implies users are customizing *their own* columns.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете искључити могућност корисницима да управљају и прилагођавају своје колоне са информацијама о датотеци у приказу листе.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'mogućnost' is repeated and can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete onemogućiti korisnicima da upravljaju i prilagođavaju kolone sa informacijama o datoteci u prikazu liste.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure can be improved for better flow and readability. 'Možete onemogućiti mogućnost korisnicima' sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete onemogućiti korisnicima upravljanje i prilagođavanje kolona sa informacijama o datoteci u prikazu liste.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'налаштовувати їх' is a bit awkward. 'Налаштовувати' implies more complex configuration than 'customize'. A more accurate translation of 'customize' would be 'персоналізувати' or 'налаштовувати на власний розсуд'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ви можете вимкнути можливість для користувачів керувати стовпцями інформації про файл та персоналізувати їх у поданні списку.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence is a bit long and could be broken down for better readability. While grammatically correct, it can feel dense.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ви можете вимкнути можливість для користувачів керувати стовпцями інформації про файл. Також, ви можете завадити їм налаштовувати їх у поданні списку.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "您可以为用户停用在列表视图中管理和自定义文件信息列的功能" is slightly awkward. '停用' (tingyong) implies a more complete disabling, while the English suggests more of an option to disable the *ability* to manage and customize. A more accurate phrasing would better reflect the nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您可以禁用用户在列表视图中管理和自定义文件信息列的功能。
